i18n-title: Opt out of PRISM, the NSA’s global data surveillance program - PRISM Break
i18n-meta-description: Opt out of PRISM, the NSA’s global data surveillance program. Stop reporting your online activities to the American government with these free alternatives to proprietary software.
i18n-intro: 退出 PRISM，美国国家安全局 NSA 的全球数据监视项目。 选用下面这些免费软件代替那些专有软件，能停止把你的上网行为报告给美国政府。
i18n-debian-desc: 流行的正派的 GNU/Linux 发行版
i18n-fedora-desc: 快捷、稳定、强大的 GNU/Linux 发行版
i18n-gentoo-desc: Distribution about choice, control and security.
i18n-linuxmint-desc: 令人舒适和易于使用的 GNU/Linux 发行版
i18n-liberte-desc: Live CD/USB 设计的用于敌对环境的通信辅助系统
i18n-tails-desc: Live CD/USB 设计的致力于保护你的隐私和匿名性的系统
i18n-trisquel-desc: FSF（自由软件基金会）认可的，对用户友好的 GNU/Linux 发行版
i18n-torbrowser-desc: 以加密、匿名的方式浏览
i18n-disconnect-desc: 阻止第三方网站跟踪你
i18n-httpseverywhere-desc: 能为你和数千个网站间的通信加密
i18n-noscript-desc: 只启用你信任的网站上面的 JavaScript、Java 和 Flash 内容
i18n-seeksproject-desc: 开放的去中心化的协作搜索平台
i18n-opennic-desc: 完全保持DNS中立（不受干预）
i18n-namecoin-desc: 分布式DNS基于 Bitcoin 技术
i18n-freenet-desc: 去中心化的抗审查网络
i18n-syndie-desc: 分布式匿名讨论区软件
i18n-bitcoin-desc: 没有中央机构的P2P数字货币
i18n-cryptocoins-desc: 其他加密数字货币的列表
i18n-bitmessage-desc: 加密、去中心化的email服务器
i18n-tormail-desc: Tor Mail 是一个免费的匿名邮件提供商
i18n-kolab-desc: Groupware server for email, calendars, adress books and synchronization to mobile phones.
i18n-evolution-desc: 支持GPG的免费邮件和日历应用
i18n-kontact-desc: 支持GPG的 KDE 邮件客户端
i18n-enigmail-desc: 一个 OpenPGP 插件用于 Thunderbird/Icedove.
i18n-openstreetmap-desc: 自由、世界性的协作地图
i18n-gitannex-desc: 在你的电脑和驱动器之间同步文件夹
i18n-seafile-desc: 自行架设用于团队协作和文件同步
i18n-sparkleshare-desc: 自行架设的版本控制和文件同步
i18n-tahoelafs-desc: 自由和开放的云存储系统
i18n-diaspora-desc: 社区运作的分布式社交网络
i18n-friendica-desc: 尊重隐私的分布式联合社交网络
i18n-gnusocial-desc: 自行架设的去中心化社交网络
i18n-movim-desc: 私密、去中心化的社交网络服务器
i18n-pumpio-desc: 自行假设的社交信息流服务器
i18n-salutatoi-desc: 多前端多用途的通信工具
i18n-tent-desc: 自由自主的社交网络协议
i18n-otr-desc: 安装并启用这个插件来加密在Pidgin中的聊天
i18n-adium-desc: 用于OS X的免费的多协议的聊天软件
i18n-retroshare-desc: 免费安全的 P2P 交流平台
i18n-weechat-desc: Extensible and customisable chat client for IRC and XMPP/Jabber.
i18n-bitlbee-desc: IRC instant messaging gateway that supports a bunch of protocols.
i18n-mumble-desc: 加密的低延迟的语音聊天
i18n-gnumediagoblin-desc: 去中心化的媒体发布平台
i18n-piwigo-desc: 自行架设的照片库平台
i18n-wordpress-desc: 自行架设的网站发布平台
i18n-zenphoto-desc: 自行架设的媒体管理系统
i18n-etherpad-desc: 自行架设的实时协作文档服务
i18n-piwik-desc: 开放源代码、自行架设的web分析服务
i18n-redphone-desc: 安全私密的电话呼叫用于Android.
i18n-surespot-desc: 免费、开源、端到端的加密短信
i18n-textsecure-desc: 安全的 SMS/MMS 通信用于Android.
i18n-fsf-definition-title: *本网站使用 自由软件基金会 的自由软件定义
i18n-fsf-quote: “自由软件”意味着软件尊重用户的自由和社区。粗略地说，用户有运行、拷贝、分发、学习、修改和改善软件的自由。有了这些自由，用户（包括单独的和协作的）可以控制程序和程序为他们做的事情。
i18n-eff-title: 采取行动来反对PRISM项目，到电子前哨基金会行动中心
i18n-eff-quote-2: 最近卫报和华盛顿邮报的报道确认了电话记录和互联网活动监视程序的秘密。是时候做一个完整核算美国的秘密监视程序，并且终止违宪的监控。
i18n-operating-system-note:
Apple、Google和Microsoft是PRISM项目的一部分。他们专有的操作系统不能被信任来保护你的个人信息不被泄露给美国国家安全局NSA。

这留给我们两个免费替代品: GNU/Linux 和 BSD.

GNU/Linux 有一个更大的社区来帮助你的转换过程。推荐你 It's recommended that you begin your explorations by looking for a GNU/Linux distribution that suits your needs.

Canonical’s Ubuntu is not recommended by PRISM Break because it contains Amazon ads and data leaks by default.

Note: PRISM Break recommends the no-codecs edition of Linux Mint, as the other editions are encumbered with software patents. More info.
i18n-android-note:
CyanogenMod licensing: “CyanogenMod does still include various hardware-specific code, which is also slowly being open-sourced anyway.” —Wikipedia

F-Droid is a free alternative to the Google Play app store.
i18n-ios-note: iOS is insecure, and unfortunately there aren't a lot of free encryption apps available for iOS either. It's also impossible to verify whether if an iOS app was compiled from the original source.
i18n-web-browser-note:
Use a combination of Tor Browser and a free web browser of your choice to the surf the web.

Try to use Tor Browser as often as possible. Browsing is slower with Tor, but far more secure.

Note: Mozilla Firefox is technically not completely free software, as Mozilla recommends non-free add-ons on their website.
i18n-web-browser-addons-note:
Safeguard your privacy and stop websites from tracking you by installing Adblock Edge, Disconnect, HTTPS Everywhere, and NoScript in your browser.

Cryptocat and Mailvelope are browser addons for IM and email encryption, respectively. At this time, it may be more secure to use external software for more proven encryption.

Why not Adblock Plus? Adblock Plus shows “acceptable ads” by default, and uses more memory than Adblock Edge.

Why not Ghostery? Ghostery is a proprietary plugin. Use Disconnect instead.
i18n-web-search-note:
Startpage is proprietary, hosted in the USA/Netherlands, and provides you with anonymized Google search results (including images).

DuckDuckGo is partly proprietary, hosted in the USA, and provides you with anonymized Bing search results.

Pick your poison.
i18n-email-services-note:
Bitmessage is a promising alternative to email, but it’s is not ready for daily usage. Use at your own risk.

Riseup is hosted in the USA. It’s also beginning to offer VPN, chat, and etherpad services.

Why not Hushmail? See “compromises to email privacy”.

The only way to have full control over your email is to run your own mail server. This is not for everyone though, as it requires considerable time investment and technical knowledge.

While not complete yet, the FreedomBox project is aiming at creating a turnkey solution for encrypted communications.
i18n-email-clients-note:
Here is a guide to encrypting your email with Thunderbird, GNU Privacy Guard (GPG), and Enigmail.

Note: Mozilla Thunderbird is technically not completely free software, as Mozilla recommends non-free add-ons on their website.
i18n-email-encryption-note:
“Pretty Good Privacy (PGP) is a data encryption and decryption computer program that provides cryptographic privacy and authentication for data communication. PGP is often used for signing, encrypting and decrypting texts, e-mails, files, directories and whole disk partitions to increase the security of e-mail communications.”

— Wikipedia
i18n-social-networking-note: identi.ca is a popular Twitter-like social networking hub for the free and open source software community. The site is converting to the pump.io software platform sometime this week.
i18n-instant-messaging-note: Cryptocat in the Web browser add-ons section may be of interest as well.
i18n-video-voip-note:
Jitsi is a drop-in, encrypted replacement for almost all the tasks Skype is used for.

Mumble an open source voice chat client in the style of Ventrilo and TeamSpeak.

WebRTC is an upcoming, promising browser to browser communications API.
i18n-online-transactions-note:
Bitcoin 数据库链是去中心化的，比特币网络中所有交易都是公开的。

“这是 TCP/IP 网络里面的钱” —Paul Buchheit
i18n-media-publishing-note: 可以自行架设是很重要的。把你的博客架设在 WordPress.com 数据的安全性没有比放在 Blogger 或者 Tumblr好。
i18n-cloud-storage-note:
为什么不用MEGA? 虽然MEGA也是免费的，但软件是专有的。

为什么不用SpiderOak? SpiderOak是专有软件

为什么不用Tarsnap? Tarsnap部分是专有的并且把你的数据放在Amazon Web Services.
i18n-web-analytics-note: Piwik 分析也用于本站。它被设置为隐藏最后八位(255.255.255.???)访问者IP。点这里检查实时数据prism-break.org/analytics.
i18n-dns-provider-note:
Google公共DNS 持久性地记录你的运营商ISP和位置信息用于分析。你的IP地址也被存放24小时。

OpenNIC has not adopted an official policy concerning log query privacy/anonymization. More information here.
i18n-darknet-note:
“地下网络是一个匿名的网络，链接只会在可信节点之间建立。

地下网络不同于其他分布式P2P网络，分享是匿名的，因此用户可以交流而少点害怕政府或企业的干扰”

—维基百科
i18n-warning: 警告: 使用这个网站的推荐项目并不百分百保证你的通信能够方法监控状态。请在信任这些软件处理敏感信息之前自行做研究。
